title: Bellevue (Kristiansand)
text: Bellevue is a neighbourhood in the city of <a href="Kristiansand">Kristiansand</a> in <a href="Agder">Agder</a> county, <a href="Norway">Norway</a>. It is located in the borough of <a href="Grim%2C%20Kristiansand">Grim</a> and in the district of Grim. Bellevue is southeast of <a href="Idda%20%28Kristiansand%29">Idda</a>. The <a href="European%20route%20E18">European route E18</a> highway runs along the east side of the neighborhood and the <a href="Norwegian%20National%20Road%209">Norwegian National Road 9</a> runs just north of the neighborhood. <a href="National%20Archival%20Services%20of%20Norway">National Archival Services of Norway</a> for <a href="Southern%20Norway">Southern Norway</a> is located in Bellevue.
